'''Atmospheric Revolution''' is [[Chongyun]]'s Level 2 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Constellation's CD reduction only applies if the CD starts while the Frost Field's [[infusion]] would be active, even for Bow and Catalyst wielders.
** For example, if a character obtains the infusion and then walks out of the field, and starts a CD before the infusion expires, the duration of this CD will still be reduced.
